# File lib/cucumber/parser/feature.rb, line 66
        def build(filter)
          if(filter.nil? || feature_elements.accept?(filter) || (!bg.empty? && filter.accept?(bg)))
            background = bg.respond_to?(:build) ? bg.build : nil      
            Ast::Feature.new(
              background, 
              comment.build, 
              tags.build, 
              header.text_value, 
              feature_elements.build(background, filter)
            )
          end
        end
